home.title: Welcome to Light in a Bottle
home.cta_text: Ready to share your light and connect authentically?

support.title: True Support & Accountability
support.description: Build a community of deep, genuine support. Share your thoughts and feelings in a safe, encouraging space. Forge accountability partnerships that uplift and inspire.

bottles.title: Messages in a Bottle
bottles.description: Send your "message in a bottle" out to the community. These are thoughtful expressions, shared once a day, fostering mindful communication.

reactions.title: Encouraging Reactions Only
reactions.description: React to bottles with kindness. Our platform filters out negativity, ensuring every interaction is positive and uplifting. No irony, no sarcasm, just pure support.

connections.title: Thoughtful Connections
connections.description: Like a bottle? Add the sender as a friend. View their bottles and react by sending your own. No direct DMs until a meaningful, long-term bond is formed (30 bi-directional bottles).

mindful.title: One Thoughtful Bottle a Day
mindful.description: Everyone can send only one bottle per day. This encourages mindful expression, ensuring each message is heartfelt and considered. After 30 shared bottles, this increases to two.

privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Light in a Bottle ("us", "we", or "our") collects, uses, and shares information about you when you use our mobile application (the "Service").

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.intro: We collect information you provide directly to us and information we collect automatically when you use the Service.

account.title: Account Information
account.content: When you create an account, we collect information such as your username, password (hashed), and email address (optional).

content.title: User Content
content.content: We collect the content you create and share on the Service, such as your "messages in a bottle," reactions, and any direct messages exchanged with other users once that feature is enabled.

comms.title: Communications
comms.content: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you, such as your name, email address, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.

usage.title: Usage Information
usage.content: We collect information about your activity on the Service, such as the messages you view, your interactions with other users, features you use, and the time, frequency, and duration of your activities.

device.title: Device Information
device.content: We collect information about the device you use to access the Service, including hardware model, operating system and version, unique device identifiers, and mobile network information.

log.title: Log Information
log.content: When you use our Service, we automatically collect and store certain information in server logs. This includes details of how you used our service, IP address, device event information such as crashes, system activity, hardware settings, browser type, browser language, the date and time of your request and referral URL.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information

list.1: Provide, operate, and maintain our Service;
list.2: Improve, personalize, and expand our Service;
list.3: Understand and analyze how you use our Service;
list.4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality;
list.5: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the Service, and for marketing and promotional purposes (with your consent, where required);
list.7: Send you push notifications (with your consent);
list.8: Find and prevent fraud and abuse; and
list.9: For compliance purposes, including enforcing our Terms of Service, or other legal rights, or as may be required by applicable laws and regulations or requested by any judicial process or governmental agency.

sharing.title: 3. How We Share Your Information

users.content: Your username and the content you share as "messages in a bottle" are visible to other users of the Service. If you add friends or engage in direct messaging (when available), those users will see your interactions with them.

vendors.title: Vendors and Service Providers

User content such as messages may be retained to maintain the integrity of the platform and community experience.

about.title: About Light in a Bottle
about.subtitle: Discover the story behind our app.
about.welcome: Welcome to Light in a Bottle, an application crafted with the vision of bringing a little more calm, mindfulness, and positivity into your daily life. In a world that often feels fast-paced and overwhelming, we wanted to create a serene digital space where users can pause, reflect, and reconnect with themselves.
about.creator_story: This app was born from a personal journey of seeking tranquility amidst chaos. As the lead developer, Jane Doe, I envisioned a tool that wasn't just functional, but also an experience – a gentle reminder to appreciate the small moments and cultivate inner peace. The "Light in a Bottle" concept symbolizes capturing those fleeting moments of clarity, inspiration, and hope that can illuminate our paths.
about.mission: Our mission is to provide a simple, intuitive, and aesthetically pleasing platform that supports your well-being. We believe that technology, when designed thoughtfully, can be a powerful ally in fostering mental and emotional health. Every feature, color choice, and interaction within this app has been carefully considered to align with our core values of calmness, simplicity, and modern elegance.
about.closing: Thank you for joining our community. We hope Light in a Bottle helps you find your own spark.

help.title: Help Center
help.contact_description: If you couldn't find the answer to your question in our FAQ, please feel free to reach out to our support team.

change_password.question: How do I change my password?
change_password.answer: You can change your password from the Settings page. Navigate to "Settings", then find the "Security" section. There you will find an option to update your password. You will need to enter your current password and then your new password twice.

notification_frequency.question: How can I adjust notification frequency?
notification_frequency.answer: To adjust your notification frequency, go to the "Settings" page. Under "Notification Settings", you'll find a dropdown menu labeled "Notification Frequency". Select your preferred option (e.g., Instantly, Daily Digest, Weekly Summary, or Never) and save your changes.

pin_code.question: What is the PIN code feature?
pin_code.answer: The PIN code feature adds an extra layer of security to your app. When enabled, you'll need to enter a 4-digit PIN to access the app. You can enable, disable, or change your PIN from the "Security" section within the "Settings" page.

forgot_pin.question: I forgot my PIN. What should I do?
forgot_pin.answer: If you've forgotten your PIN, you'll typically need to reset it. This process might involve verifying your identity through your email or other security questions. Please look for a "Forgot PIN?" option on the PIN entry screen or contact support for assistance.
